knimeNode.name: EclipseMetrics
knimeNode.shortDescription: Eclipse Metrics Adapter. ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

intro.p: This node can be used to read data from Eclipse Metrics report (XML format). Only sourcefile is retrieved.
The report must be generated using XML Export format: Source tree. For further information about report generation please refer to Eclipse Metrics documentation here.

Please check workflow examples here or inside plugin jar.

fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the Eclipse Metrics file grouped by class.
Datatable just read from the Eclipse Metrics file grouped by methods.
